attributes.action: Stop People Selling Essentials Items At Inflated Prices
attributes.additional_details: Some people have only been buying things to sell for a profit, like baby milk, nappies, toilet rolls, wash items etc. Meaning people can't get things they need for everyday living. They are going around shops buying as much as they can & then selling them on at inflated prices on places like Amazon & Ebay. People that can't get the items can't buy these things at these prices as it can be as much as a months shopping or more for one item.
attributes.background: We want them to put a stop to people selling essentials at inflated prices on places like Amazon & Ebay.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
